text: this was the weapon found still strapped
to Curran BOTS body last Saturday night
he and his fellow attackers used three
identical 12-inch pink knives made of
ceramic to murder five people
counterterrorism detectives want help on
where the ernesto knives were bought the
men's already killed three other people
on London Bridge with a van hide from
B&Q throughout the carnage heroic
members of the public tried to stop them
we have stories of people who came out
armed with chairs other items were
throwing bottles and anything they could
get their hands on with a view to trying
to prevent the attackers either coming
into pubs and bars but more importantly
to scare them off to try and stop other
people being attacked afterwards in the
van police found 13 petrol bombs made
with lighter fluid and cloth cut from
tracksuit bottoms as well as two blow
torches the day had started with the
ringleader could and buffed who was on
police bail trying to hire a seven and a
half ton truck he didn't have enough
money so instead he hired the white van
from B&Q in Romford which the men picked
up sometime after 6:30 p.m. then leaving
barking soon after 7:30 they set off for
central London at 958 they arrived at
London Bridge driving across it and then
back again before plowing into
pedestrians on their third pass by the
time they crashed the van at 10:07
they'd fatally wounded three people they
then used the knives to kill five more
at 10:16 they were shot dead by police
detectives believe that behind this
green door in East Ham was the men's
safe house in a top floor beds it rented
by Rashid Rida one two months ago
detectives discovered items that have
been used to make their petrol bombs and
their fake suicide vest and an
english-language copy of the Koran left
open as a page referencing martyrdom
Daniel hunter BBC News East Ham
you
